entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
